'''''57Digital''''' is a mobile application development company based in {{w|Sheffield}}, {{w|England}}.   It is run by Jamie Chapman and Luke Dixon, two software engineers from {{w|Sheffield}}.

57Digital is responsible for creating an official<ref>{{tweet|carlmanneh|182406087545339904|Need a companion app for Minecraft? We recommend this one: http://itunes.apple.com/ng/app/minecraft-explorer-pro/id449354665?mt{{=}}8 …|March 21, 2012}}</ref><ref>[https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/31269640713/supporting-minecraft-apps-on-ios Supporting Minecraft Apps on iOS] on [[MCUpdate]]</ref> ''[[Minecraft]]'' companion guide, ''[[Minecraft Explorer]]''.
